dataprojects.descripcion: A React app that consumes a Node.js API. User authentication is carried out with JsonWebToken. Mongodb/Mongoose was used for the database and Styled-components for the styling. Both back end and front end were coded in Typescript.
Portfolio that I originally built with pure Javascript and that I later translated into React. I used the Intersection Observer API, and translated the content with the help of React-i18n.
Task management system I built with React and JWT authentification. It communicates with a Node.js API and a Mongo Atlas database.

Replica of the famous site. Following registration and log in, users have access to a public area where they can post messages, and an additional private route where they can view and edit their user info.
Blackjack game I built based on a Free Code Camp project, to which I later added upgrades: notifications on the state of the game, a dealer bot, user interface to place bets, etc.
